Posts.Content: andimd wrote: i am 37 years old and, after 2 recent mammograms, was told I have micro calcifications that are probably benign.  The radiologist recommended waiting 6 months and then doing another mammogram.  My mom had breast cancer at the age of 42 so my doctor said that I can see a breast specialist now if I want to.  Has anyone ever been in this situation or had any problems with waiting the 6 months?  Not sure what I should do? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: wait 6 months for another mammogram? andimd Mouche
